## Block.clear() method

Clear the block. If force, no validation will take place \*

**Signature:**

```typescript
clear(force?: boolean): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  force | boolean | _(Optional)_ Whether to force clearing without validation. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A promise resolving to a boolean indicating success.
